ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi's reply concerning the Chains nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: Anthem, please don t stop playing :( I understand your frustration and know that you are always looking at the positive aspects of the game... hang in there!
ygData.messageBody:
Anthem, please don't stop playing :(
I understand your frustration and know that you are always looking at the
positive aspects of the game... hang in there!

Take a little break and play on Morrell for a bit ...

Hally


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Andy Simpson [mailto:hornsfan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 12:48 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi's reply concerning the Chains nerf
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Reece, Tom CPT- 25IDL G4
>
> > There was a particular exploit where two bards could get
> > together, play this
> > song (the level 54 one), and the Fear song, and any NPCs in the
> > effect range
> > -Gordon
>
> Hmm, they don't properly test things and we are the exploiters for
> discovering this. Nice. I think I'm about done playing
> their game now...
>
> Anthem Dirgemaker
> Retired Bard of Qeynos
> Solusek Ro
